mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes the articles entitled "The Washington Story", "Paging Home Grown Square Dance Fashions", "Fullerton Jamboree", "Oceanside Roundup", This edition also includes the monthly articles entitled "On the Record", "Idea Corral", "Round the Outside Ring" and "From the Floor" (letters to the editor). The "Green Sheet Of Local Southern California News" features, "Most Terrific Square Dance Ever Held To Be Centennial Celebration Feature".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
